ActivateEC2Remote.name: ActivateEC2Remote
ActivateEC2Remote.description: Grants permission to start the Amazon EC2 instance that your AWS Cloud9 IDE connects to

CreateEnvironmentEC2.name: CreateEnvironmentEC2
CreateEnvironmentEC2.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Cloud9 development environment, launches an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance, and then hosts the environment on the instance

CreateEnvironmentMembership.name: CreateEnvironmentMembership
CreateEnvironmentMembership.description: Grants permission to add an environment member to an AWS Cloud9 development environment

CreateEnvironmentSSH.name: CreateEnvironmentSSH
CreateEnvironmentSSH.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Cloud9 SSH development environment

CreateEnvironmentToken.name: CreateEnvironmentToken
CreateEnvironmentToken.description: Grants permission to create an authentication token that allows a connection between the AWS Cloud9 IDE and the user's environment

DeleteEnvironment.name: DeleteEnvironment
DeleteEnvironment.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Cloud9 development environment. If the environment is hosted on an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance, also terminates the instance

DeleteEnvironmentMembership.name: DeleteEnvironmentMembership
DeleteEnvironmentMembership.description: Grants permission to delete an environment member from an AWS Cloud9 development environment

DescribeEC2Remote.name: DescribeEC2Remote
DescribeEC2Remote.description: Grants permission to get details about the connection to the EC2 development environment, including host, user, and port

DescribeEnvironmentMemberships.name: DescribeEnvironmentMemberships
DescribeEnvironmentMemberships.description: Grants permission to get information about environment members for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

DescribeEnvironmentStatus.name: DescribeEnvironmentStatus
DescribeEnvironmentStatus.description: Grants permission to get status information for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

DescribeEnvironments.name: DescribeEnvironments
DescribeEnvironments.description: Grants permission to get information about AWS Cloud9 development environments

DescribeSSHRemote.name: DescribeSSHRemote
DescribeSSHRemote.description: Grants permission to get details about the connection to the SSH development environment, including host, user, and port

GetEnvironmentConfig.name: GetEnvironmentConfig
GetEnvironmentConfig.description: Grants permission to get configuration information that's used to initialize the AWS Cloud9 IDE

GetEnvironmentSettings.name: GetEnvironmentSettings
GetEnvironmentSettings.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified development environment

GetMembershipSettings.name: GetMembershipSettings
GetMembershipSettings.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified environment member

GetMigrationExperiences.name: GetMigrationExperiences
GetMigrationExperiences.description: Grants permission to get the migration experience for a cloud9 user

GetUserPublicKey.name: GetUserPublicKey
GetUserPublicKey.description: Grants permission to get the user's public SSH key, which is used by AWS Cloud9 to connect to SSH development environments

GetUserSettings.name: GetUserSettings
GetUserSettings.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified user

ListEnvironments.name: ListEnvironments
ListEnvironments.description: Grants permission to get a list of AWS Cloud9 development environment identifiers

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a cloud9 environment

ModifyTemporaryCredentialsOnEnvironmentE.name: ModifyTemporaryCredentialsOnEnvironmentEC2
ModifyTemporaryCredentialsOnEnvironmentE.description: Grants permission to set AWS managed temporary credentials on the Amazon EC2 instance that's used by the AWS Cloud9 integrated development environment (IDE)

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a cloud9 environment

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a cloud9 environment

UpdateEnvironment.name: UpdateEnvironment
UpdateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to change the settings of an existing AWS Cloud9 development environment

UpdateEnvironmentMembership.name: UpdateEnvironmentMembership
UpdateEnvironmentMembership.description: Grants permission to change the settings of an existing environment member for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

UpdateEnvironmentSettings.name: UpdateEnvironmentSettings
UpdateEnvironmentSettings.description: Grants permission to update the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified development environment

UpdateMembershipSettings.name: UpdateMembershipSettings
UpdateMembershipSettings.description: Grants permission to update the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified environment member

UpdateSSHRemote.name: UpdateSSHRemote
UpdateSSHRemote.description: Grants permission to update details about the connection to the SSH development environment, including host, user, and port

UpdateUserSettings.name: UpdateUserSettings
UpdateUserSettings.description: Grants permission to update IDE-specific settings of an AWS Cloud9 user

ValidateEnvironmentName.name: ValidateEnvironmentName
ValidateEnvironmentName.description: Grants permission to validate the environment name during the process of creating an AWS Cloud9 development environment
